testcase.classname: To validate the account creation of facebook application
testcase.name: To create new account
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser and maximize the window.........................passed When To launch the url of facebook application..............................passed And To click the create new button..........................................passed And To pass the firstname in firstname text box.............................passed And To pass the second name in secondname text box..........................passed And To pass mobile number or email id in the email text box.................passed And To create new password using newpassword text box......................passed Then To close the chrome browser............................................passed
